$schema.description: path to the JSON Schema to use for the validation of the JSON file describing the task

id.description: unique identifier of the user in the ToDo Manager service (mandatory)

email.description: email address of the user, whitch must be used for the authentication to the service (mandatory, it must be a valid email address)

password.description: the user's password, which must be used for the autentication to the service (the password must be at least 6 characters long and at most 20 characters long)
